argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cznrng.y | |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) |
| 2 |  | cznrng.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | cznrng.x | |- X = ( Y sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> C ) >. ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nnnn0 | |- ( N e. NN -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( N e. NN /\ C e. B ) -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_zncrng | |- ( N e. NN0 -> Y e. CRing ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. NN /\ C e. B ) -> Y e. CRing ) |
| 8 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( Y e. CRing -> Y e. Ring ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ringabl | |- ( Y e. Ring -> Y e. Abel ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( N e. NN /\ C e. B ) -> Y e. Abel ) |
| 11 | 3 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( Base ` X ) = ( Base ` ( Y sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> C ) >. ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_baseid | |- Base = Slot ( Base ` ndx ) |
| 13 |  | #P_basendxnmulrndx | |- ( Base ` ndx ) =/= ( .r ` ndx ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_setsnid | |- ( Base ` Y ) = ( Base ` ( Y sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> C ) >. ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( Base ` X ) = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 16 | 3 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( +g ` X ) = ( +g ` ( Y sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> C ) >. ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_plusgid | |- +g = Slot ( +g ` ndx ) |
| 18 |  | #P_plusgndxnmulrndx | |- ( +g ` ndx ) =/= ( .r ` ndx ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_setsnid | |- ( +g ` Y ) = ( +g ` ( Y sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> C ) >. ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 19 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( +g ` X ) = ( +g ` Y ) |
| 21 | 15, 20 | #P_ablprop | |- ( X e. Abel <-> Y e. Abel ) |
| 22 | 10, 21 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( N e. NN /\ C e. B ) -> X e. Abel ) |
